pre_caption: This is a dynamic cityscape scenery shot captured from a fast-moving, downward-tilting perspective. The video follows a rapid descent alongside a modern, multi-story residential building with numerous glass balconies, set against a dramatic sunset sky filled with orange light on the horizon and dark clouds above. In the background, another high-rise is visible under construction, complete with a crane, while the ground level reveals a construction site and other illuminated urban structures. There is no main subject because the wide, vertiginous FPV-style shot is intended to capture the overall atmosphere, scale, and energy of the urban environment rather than focusing on a specific person or object.
